name: Land Grants
description: Grants of territory, strongholds, or estates awarded to characters for outstanding deeds.

grants.name: Small Estate
grants.description: A farmstead or cottage with surrounding land, suitable for a family or small retinue.
responsibilities: Pay any owed taxes to the local lord

grants.name: Tower
grants.description: A fortified tower, often on the edge of civilization. Serves as a watchtower or wizard's retreat.
responsibilities: Report threats to the local authority

grants.name: Keep
grants.description: A modest fortification with walls and a garrison, suitable for defending a strategic location.
responsibilities: Maintain a garrison of at least 10 guards
Provide military support to your liege

grants.name: Castle
grants.description: A full castle with multiple towers, a great hall, and surrounding village.
features: Castle with great hall, towers, and inner bailey

grants.name: Wilderness Territory
grants.description: A grant of unclaimed wilderness to tame and settle as you see fit.
grants.income: 0 gp initially; up to 50 gp per month once developed
features: Large tract of wilderness (several square miles)
Freedom to build and develop as desired
Right to tax any settlers who arrive
responsibilities: Clear the land of monsters and hazards
